T02TD1375E:251a-1: yo ga sha dangga n'a ma /
T02TD1375E:251a-3: rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1375E:251a-4: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD1375E:251a-5: / so sor gcod dang bsam gtan dang //
T02TD1375E:251a-6: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1375E:251a-7: rjes su dran pa ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1375E:251a-8: rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu gsungs //
T02TD1375E:251a-9: mi g-yo ba ni gsum ldan gyis //
T02TD1375E:251a-10: dh'u t'i ra rlung bcud gyur pa //
T02TD1375E:251a-11: phyi nang rtog 'gags rtags byung ba //
T02TD1375E:251a-12: so sor gcod pa'i yan lag yin //
T02TD1375E:251a-13: rtags rnams brtan par mthong 'gyur la //
T02TD1375E:251a-14: shes rab rtog dpyod dga' bde dang //
T02TD1375E:251a-15: rtse gcig mi g-yo rtog med ni //
T02TD1375E:251a-16: bsam gtan gyi ni yan lag yin //
T02TD1375E:251a-17: rlung bcud bu mang chud gyur pas //
T02TD1375E:251a-18: 'khor lo bzhi yi thig le'i nang //
T02TD1375E:251a-20: srog rtsol gyi ni yan lag yin //
T02TD1375E:251b-0: @251b srog rlung thig le'i nang chud pas //
T02TD1375E:251b-1: rlung sems bde chen 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1375E:251b-2: ham gi thig ler zin pa ni //
T02TD1375E:251b-3: 'dzin pa yi ni yan lag yin //
T02TD1375E:251b-4: rlung sems thig ler zin stobs kyis //
T02TD1375E:251b-5: gtum mo'i me 'od snang ba dang //
T02TD1375E:251b-6: bde drod khyad par can 'byung ba //
T02TD1375E:251b-7: rjes su dran pa'i yan lag yin //
T02TD1375E:251b-8: rtags bcu rdzogs par gyur pa na //
T02TD1375E:251b-9: thig le chen po'i snang ba 'byung //
T02TD1375E:251b-10: sna tshogs thig le chen po la //
T02TD1375E:251b-11: re kh'a nag po'i ri mo 'byung //
T02TD1375E:251b-12: de nas 'gro drug la sogs dang //
T02TD1375E:251b-13: shin tu pra ba'i sprul sku dang //
T02TD1375E:251b-14: longs sku du ma mthong gyur pa //
T02TD1375E:251b-15: sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal yin //
T02TD1375E:251b-16: de la sems ni thim pa na //
T02TD1375E:251b-17: ting 'dzin yan lag mthar phyin pa'o //
T02TD1375E:251b-18: rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1375E:251b-19: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug gis pandi ta ma h'a bi bh'u hi tsandra la gsungs pa'o /
T02TD1375E:251b-21: // / des sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur nas gsungs pa'o//
